attribute NC_GLOBAL acknowledgement String Please acknowledge the use of these data with the following statement: These data were provided by GHRSST and the US National Oceanographic Data Center. This project was supported in part by a grant from the NOAA Climate Data Record (CDR) Program for satellites. The data were downloaded from NOAA CoastWatch-West Coast Regional Node and Southwest Fisheries Science Center's Environmental Research Division. To cite these data in a paper, please follow the instructions in the license and at this link: https://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/information.html#citeDataset

attribute NC_GLOBAL history String 2014-02-11 The entire Pathfinder Version 5.2 dataset (daily daytime and nighttime files) was downloaded from https://data.nodc.noaa.gov/pathfinder/Version5.2 to NOAA NMFS SWFSC ERD.
2017-04-20 Data from daytime and nighttime Pathfinder Version 5.2 L3-Collated files for each day were averaged, pixel-by-pixel, to create a daily file that contains mean daily values.
2017-04-20 Multi-day composites were created by averaging, pixel by pixel, data from the daily files.

Multi-day composites and composites of day and night datasets were generated by the Environmental Research Division (NOAA/NMFS/SWFSC/ERD).

attribute sea_surface_temperature comment String Skin temperature of the ocean. This dataset contains only the highest quality data (level 5, best_quality) as defined by the GHRSST Data Specification version 2
attribute sea_surface_temperature coverage_content_type String physicalMeasurement
attribute sea_surface_temperature ioos_category String Temperature
attribute sea_surface_temperature long_name String Sea Surface Skin Temperature

attribute sea_surface_temperature units String degree_C
attribute sea_surface_temperature valid_max double 45.0

variable sea_ice_fraction   double time, latitude, longitude
attribute sea_ice_fraction _FillValue double -1.28
attribute sea_ice_fraction cell_methods String time: mean (interval: 1.0 month)
attribute sea_ice_fraction colorBarMaximum double 1.0
attribute sea_ice_fraction colorBarMinimum double 0.0
attribute sea_ice_fraction comment String Sea ice concentration data are taken from the EUMETSAT Ocean and Sea Ice Satellite Application Facility (OSISAF) Global Daily Sea Ice Concentration Reprocessing Data Set (https://data.nodc.noaa.gov/cgi-bin/iso?id=gov.noaa.nodc:0068294) when these data are available. The data are reprojected and interpolated from their original polar stereographic projection at 10km spatial resolution to the 4km Pathfinder Version 5.2 grid. When the OSISAF data are not available for both hemispheres on a given day, the sea ice concentration data are taken from the sea_ice_fraction variable found in the L4 GHRSST DailyOI SST product from NOAA/NCDC, and are interpolated from the 25km DailyOI grid to the 4km Pathfinder Version 5.2 grid.
attribute sea_ice_fraction coverage_content_type String physicalMeasurement
attribute sea_ice_fraction ioos_category String Ice Distribution
attribute sea_ice_fraction long_name String Sea Ice Fraction
attribute sea_ice_fraction references String Reynolds, et al.(2006) Daily High-resolution Blended Analyses. Available at http://journals.ametsoc.org/doi/full/10.1175/2007JCLI1824.1
attribute sea_ice_fraction source String NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC Daily optimum interpolation(OI) SST on 1/4-degree grid: 20121230-NCDC-L4LRblend-GLOB-v01-fv02_0-AVHRR_OI.nc.gz
attribute sea_ice_fraction standard_name String sea_ice_area_fraction
attribute sea_ice_fraction units String 1
attribute sea_ice_fraction valid_max double 1.0
attribute sea_ice_fraction valid_min double 0.0

attribute wind_speed _FillValue byte -128
attribute wind_speed cell_methods String time: mean (interval: 1.0 month)

attribute wind_speed colorBarMinimum double 0.0
attribute wind_speed comment String These wind speeds were created by NCEP-DOE Atmospheric Model Intercomparison Project (AMIP-II) reanalysis (R-2) and represent winds at 10 metres above the
sea surface.

attribute wind_speed height String 10 m
attribute wind_speed ioos_category String Wind
attribute wind_speed long_name String 10m Wind Speed
attribute wind_speed standard_name String wind_speed
attribute wind_speed units String m s-1
attribute wind_speed valid_max byte 127
attribute wind_speed valid_min byte 0
variable l2p_flags   short time, latitude, longitude
attribute l2p_flags colorBarMaximum double 16.0
attribute l2p_flags colorBarMinimum double 0.0
attribute l2p_flags comment String Bit zero (0) is always set to zero to indicate infrared data. Bit one (1) is set to zero for any pixel over water (ocean, lakes and rivers). Land pixels were determined by rasterizing the Global Self-consistent Hierarchical High-resolution Shoreline (GSHHS) Database from the NOAA National Geophysical Data Center. Any 4 km Pathfinder pixel whose area is 50% or more covered by land has bit one (1) set to 1. Bit two (2) is set to 1 when the sea_ice_fraction is 0.15 or greater. Bits three (3) and four (4) indicate lake and river pixels, respectively, and were determined by rasterizing the US World Wildlife Fund's Global Lakes and Wetlands Database. Any 4 km Pathfinder pixel whose area is 50% or more covered by lake has bit three (3) set to 1. Any 4 km Pathfinder pixel whose area is 50% or more covered by river has bit four (4) set to 1.
attribute l2p_flags coverage_content_type String referenceInformation
attribute l2p_flags flag_masks short 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256
attribute l2p_flags flag_meanings String microwave land ice lake river reserved_for_future_use unused_currently unused_currently unused_currently
attribute l2p_flags ioos_category String Quality
attribute l2p_flags long_name String L2P Flags

This information is also available in other file formats (.csv, .htmlTable, .itx, .json, .jsonlCSV, .jsonlKVP, .mat, .nc, .nccsv, .tsv, .xhtml) via a RESTful web service.
